text: The same in vitro effect that #chloroquine had on #SARSCoV1 has been reported with both CQ and #Hydroxychloroquine on #SARSCoV2. The graphs below show that the concentrations needed to inhibit #coronavirus aren't toxic to the rest the cell (from https://t.co/NxTbwB632D). https://t.co/nctuaA8lJd
